DevOps, what is NOT

DevOps, what is? and more importantly, what is not. DevOps incorporates a collaborative culture that embraces numerous practices combined together for a continuous software development methodology that places significant emphasis on feedback loops and continuous improvement. Instead of highlighting everything that DevOps is, I thought it would be good to take a step back and highlight what DevOps is not instead.
